place.name: CWMRHEIDOL
place.gazetteerText: CWMRHEIDOL, a township in Llanbadarn-fawr parish, Cardigan; on the river Rheidol, 1 mile SE of Aberystwith. Acres, 7, 824. Real property, £1, 648. Pop., 1, 304. Houses, 248. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
